plot: Joe and Friendly have been friends since they were kids. In that time, a very strong, but strange relationship has developed between them. Joe get into trouble, and Friendly gets him out. But not anymore.
title: Karma Got Friendly
plot_es: Joe and Friendly have been friends since they were kids. In that time, a very strong, but strange relationship has developed between them. Joe get into trouble, and Friendly gets him out. But not anymore.
plot_en: Joe and Friendly have been friends since they were kids. In that time, a very strong, but strange relationship has developed between them. Joe get into trouble, and Friendly gets him out. But not anymore.
